name: Jetbrains Launcher
description: Open your projects in Jetbrains IDEs

preferences.name: Shell scripts location
preferences.description: Path to the shell scripts generated by the JetBrains Toolbox app.

preferences.name: Configs location
preferences.description: Path to the configs location where all IDEs store their configuration.

preferences.name: IDE Keywords
preferences.description: Keywords used to identify IDEs. Example format: webstorm: webstorm; phpstorm: phpstorm;
preferences.default_value: clion: clion; idea: idea; intellij: idea; phpstorm: phpstorm; php: phpstorm; pycharm: pycharm; py: pycharm; rider: rider; webstorm: webstorm; web: webstorm;
